SEARCH
程序包 P2V

类 VText

java.lang.Object
P2V.VObj
P2V.VText
public class VText extends VObj
VText is a class that represents a text visual object in the application. It extends the VObj abstract class and inherits its properties and methods. However, some methods or properties are not available or read-only in VText, such as Stro, Widt, Heit, and so on.
作者:
Telsa

  • 字段概要

    从类继承的字段 P2V.VObj

    fillA, fillB, fillG, fillR, Heit, id, idct, noFill, noStro, Posi, stroA, stroB, stroG, stroR, stroWei, Widt

    说明

    Constructs a new VText object with the specified text, size, and font.
    VText(String text, float size, processing.core.PFont font, float a, float r, float g, float b)
    Constructs a new VText object with the specified text, size, font, and fill color.
    VText(String text, Variable size)
    Constructs a new VText object with the specified text and size.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • VText

      public VText()
      Constructs a new VText object with default values.

    • VText

      public VText(String text)
      Constructs a new VText object with the specified text.
      参数:
      text - The text to be displayed.

    • VText

      public VText(String text, float size)
      Constructs a new VText object with the specified text and size.
      参数:
      text - The text to be displayed.
      size - The size of the text.

    • VText

      public VText(String text, Variable size)
      Constructs a new VText object with the specified text and size.
      参数:
      text - The text to be displayed.
      size - The size of the text.

    • VText

      public VText(String text, float size, processing.core.PFont font)
      Constructs a new VText object with the specified text, size, and font.
      参数:
      text - The text to be displayed.
      size - The size of the text.
      font - The font to be applied to the text.

    • VText

      public VText(String text, float size, processing.core.PFont font, float a, float r, float g, float b)
      Constructs a new VText object with the specified text, size, font, and fill color.
      参数:
      text - The text to be displayed.
      size - The size of the text.
      font - The font to be applied to the text.
      a - The alpha value of the fill color.
      r - The red value of the fill color.
      g - The green value of the fill color.
      b - The blue value of the fill color.
